roleset.name: Natural Disaster: sever blowing dust
roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to 'haboob'.

example.name: arg5
example.text: Widespread duststorm with visibility reduced to less than 5 miles over western half of State.
example.arg: with visibility reduced to less than 5 miles over the western half of State

example.name: arg2, concatenation and relemmatization
example.text: I've slept on the high desert in a 50 mph dust storm with the full moon glowing through from above.
